resources.string:
José has developed a successful career in
3D design for 9 years.
Álvaro is an authorised voice in the world
of advertising and marketing.
After studying DAM together they pursue
a new challenge and put together their
"know-how" to develop an innovative
music application.
On List section you can find all the albums that you have already added in your profile.
On Add section you can choose the albums that you want to add to your list specifying its title, author and record label. After that you just have to press the add button.
On Delete section you can select an album that you have already saved by typing its title and delete it by pressing the delete button.

We bring closer to you magical moments within your memory. TuneHub is a tool that allows you to save your favourite albums. Has a friend recommended you an album and you want to remember to buy it later? Download TuneHub, save it and stop worrying about that uncomfortable sensation of forgetting something and have to remember it!!
